title: 1921 Matisse, 'Seated Woman,' To Be Reunited With Rosenberg Heirs
teaser: In Germany, a Matisse painting is being returned to Paul Rosenberg's family. It was one of more than 400 paintings stolen by the Nazis from the "first family" of art in Paris in the '20s and '30s.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
